title: Beautiful 3 bed/2 bath apartment in prime Red Hook
posting_body: ['PERFECT FOR SHARES:', 'Available immediately, this 3 bed/2 bath apartment is located on a beautiful, quiet street in Red Hook, one of the most active and tight-knit communities in Brooklyn.', 'Sitting on the third floor of a two-family townhouse, this brand new unit features stainless steel kitchen appliances, in-unit washer/dryer, and split A/C and heating units throughout.', 'The primary bedroom has an en-suite bathroom, with windows that overlook Columbia Street and flood the room with light.', 'The two other bedrooms are perfect for an office, nursery, guest room, or an extra room to relax.', 'The kitchen and dining/living area is bright and beautiful, with a skylight that allows sunshine to come in from above.', 'Pull down the ladder in the hallway to access the roof hatch, revealing beautiful city views.', '364 Columbia Street is just a short distance to the award-winning bars and restaurants that make Red Hook one of the most exciting places to live in New York.', "Hometown Barbecue, Widow Jane Distillery, Van Brunt Stillhouse, Red Hook Tavern, Brooklyn Crab, Keg & Lantern, Strong Rope Brewery, Red Hook Lobster Pound, Steve's Key Lime, Sunny's Bar, and so much more are just a stone's throw away.", 'Make your way north along the water to Brooklyn Bridge Park, or journey south to Valentino Pier for the most breathtaking views of the Statue of Liberty accessible by land.', 'Pets permitted.', 'Please email for details or to make an appointment to view.']
